cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 10 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: These rooms are situated on the entertainment side of our complex and are suitable for the party person. Each room has king single bunk beds with en-suite facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 8 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Love to share with like-minded female travellers on a budget? Our 8-Bed Female Dorms offer a slightly more relaxed environment compared to our 8-bed standard mixed rooms.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: This dorm offers a slightly more relaxed environment compared to our 8-bed standard room. Many of these rooms are now fully renovated. First in best dressed.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 6 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: The perfect option for guests wanting to mingle and enjoy the 7 nights a week entertainment. These rooms are close to the venue, all have en-suite bathrooms, king single bunk beds and balconies.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 4 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Looking for a break from the bottom bunk battles? Our all-female 4-bed dorms offer the ideal retreat. Positioned on the 4th floor near clubside, these rooms provide comfort and convenience with king single beds, balconies, and private en-suite facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 4 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Looking for a break from the bottom bunk battles? Our 4-bed dorms offer the perfect solution, providing both comfort and convenience. Situated on the 3rd floor, these rooms come equipped with king single beds, balconies, and private en-suite facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: All rooms are modern and clean containing air conditioning, linen and security card access & en-suite (3way bathroom doors separating the toilet & shower) . This room also has a TV and Fridge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: All rooms are modern, clean, air conditioned have linen and security card access & are en-suite.  . This room also has a TV and Fridge.

privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: All rooms are modern, clean, air conditioned have linen and security card access & are en-suite.   This room also has a TV and Fridge and balcony.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 8th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 8th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
